properties.dcterms:title: Denso Wave Spot Welding Dataset for Electronics Manufacturing
properties.dcterms:description: Comprehensive dataset containing operational parameters, quality metrics, and performance data from Denso Wave industrial robots performing spot welding in electronics manufacturing applications. Includes weld current, electrode force, cycle times, and quality inspection results.

properties.dcat:endpointDescription: REST API endpoint providing access to spot welding operational datasets with OAuth2 authentication
properties.dprod:dataProductOwner: Manufacturing Data Operations Team - Denso Wave
